metadata.title: CVE-2019-6131 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: svg-run.c in Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0 has infinite recursion with stackconsumption in svg_run_use_symbol, svg_run_element, and svg_run_use, asdemonstrated by mutool.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
